flawed_nl_solution:
The wolf pack has 20 members because 4 + 16 = <<4+16=20>>20
They need 160 pounds of meat a day because 20 x 8 = <<20*8=160>>160
They need 8000 pounds to last five days because 5 x 160 = <<5*160=8000>>8000
The hunters need to kill 40 deer because 8000 / 200 = <<8000/200=40>>40
They each need to kill one deer because 40 / 4 = <<40/4=10>>10
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
